content: vveellvveett ssccrruunncchhiieess velvet scrunchies are amazing giving a nice touch to our hair or as a charming accessory in the wrist but the best part is that they not only look good but they help to secure the hair without causing as much breakage as regular hair ties created by calina from time to yarn me up @timetoyarnmeup all photos and instructions are property of calina from
